Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    play.cache.caffeine.CaffeineDefaultExpiry
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. This is an implementation detail and it was not supposed to be public.
    play.data.validation.ValidatorProvider
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorFactoryProvider instead.
    play.libs.concurrent.HttpExecution
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Renamed to ClassLoaderExecution.
    play.libs.concurrent.HttpExecutionContext
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Renamed to ClassLoaderExecutionContext.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    play.Application.getWrappedApplication()
    Use Application.asScala() instead.
    play.ApplicationLoader.Context.sourceMapper()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Access it using ApplicationLoader.Context.devContext().
    play.BuiltInComponents.javaContextComponents()
    play.cache.AsyncCacheApi.getOptional​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to AsyncCacheApi.get(String).
    play.cache.SyncCacheApi.getOptional​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to SyncCacheApi.get(String).
    play.components.HttpErrorHandlerComponents.javaContextComponents()
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use the corresponding methods that provide MessagesApi, Langs, FileMimeTypes or HttpConfiguration.
    play.core.cookie.encoding.DefaultCookie.validateValue​(String, String)
    CookieUtil is package private, will be removed once old Cookie API is dropped
    play.core.j.MappedJavaHandlerComponents.contextComponents()
    play.data.DynamicForm.bind​(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, String...)
    play.data.Form.bind​(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.3. Use Form.bind(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, long, String...) instead to specify the maximum chars that should be consumed by the flattened form representation of the JSON.
    play.data.validation.ValidatorsComponents.validator()
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorsComponents.validatorFactory() instead.
    play.DefaultApplication.getWrappedApplication()
    play.libs.concurrent.HttpExecution.fromThread​(ExecutionContext)
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Use to ClassLoaderExecution.fromThread(ExecutionContext) instead.
    play.libs.concurrent.HttpExecutionContext.current()
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Use to ClassLoaderExecutionContext.current()} instead.
    play.libs.Files.DelegateTemporaryFile.atomicMoveFileWithFallback​(File)
    play.libs.Files.DelegateTemporaryFile.moveFileTo​(File, boolean)
    play.libs.Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveFileWithFallback​(File)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveWithFallback(File).
    play.libs.Files.TemporaryFile.moveFileTo​(File)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Files.TemporaryFile.moveTo(File).
    play.libs.Json.newDefaultMapper()
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Inject an ObjectMapper instead.
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.patch​(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.post​(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.put​(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setBody​(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setHeader​(String, String)
    use addHeader(name, value)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setQueryParameter​(String, String)
    Use addQueryParameter
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setRequestTimeout​(long)
    Use AhcWSRequest.setRequestTimeout(Duration timeout)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asByteArray()
    Use response.getBodyAsBytes().toArray()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asJson()
    Use response.getBody(json())
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asXml()
    Use response.getBody(xml())
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    Deprecated since 2.6.0. Use AhcWSResponse.getHeaders() instead.
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    Use response.getBody(inputStream())
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.patch​(InputStream)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use WSRequest.patch(BodyWritable) instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.post​(InputStream)
    Deprecated as of 2.6.0. Use WSRequest.post(BodyWritable) instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.put​(InputStream)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use WSRequest.put(BodyWritable) instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setBody​(InputStream)
    Deprecated as of 2.6.0. Use WSRequest.setBody(BodyWritable) instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setHeader​(String, String)
    use WSRequest.addHeader(String, String)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setQueryParameter​(String, String)
    use WSRequest.addQueryParameter(String, String)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setRequestTimeout​(long)
    use WSRequest.setRequestTimeout(Duration)
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    use getBody(BodyReadable) with WSBodyWritables.inputStream().
    play.Logger.debug​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.error​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.info​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.isDebugEnabled()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.isErrorEnabled()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.isInfoEnabled()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.isTraceEnabled()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.isWarnEnabled()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.trace​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.underlying()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.warn​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.mvc.Action.setContextComponents​(JavaContextComponents)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Method does nothing.
    play.mvc.Http.Cookies.getCookie​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Http.Cookies.get(String)
    play.mvc.Http.Flash.apply​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Flash.get(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Flash.getOptional​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Http.Flash.get(String).
    play.mvc.Http.Headers.addHeader​(String, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Headers.adding(String, String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Headers.remove​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Headers.removing(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Headers.toMap()
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Headers.asMap() instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Request.withTransientLang​(String)
    play.mvc.Http.RequestBuilder.bodyMultipart​(List<Http.MultipartFormData.Part<Source<ByteString, ?>>>, Files.TemporaryFileCreator, Materializer)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Renamed to Http.RequestBuilder.bodyRaw(List, Files.TemporaryFileCreator, Materializer).
    play.mvc.Http.RequestBuilder.getHeaders()
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Renamed to Http.RequestBuilder.headers().
    play.mvc.Http.RequestBuilder.transientLang​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0 Use Http.RequestBuilder.transientLang(Lang) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestHeader.getCookie​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.cookie(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestHeader.getHeaders()
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Renamed to Http.RequestHeader.headers().
    play.mvc.Http.RequestHeader.getQueryString​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.queryString(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestHeader.withTransientLang​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0 Use Http.RequestHeader.withTransientLang(Lang) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Session.apply​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Session.get(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Session.getOptional​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Http.Session.get(String).
    play.mvc.Result.getCookie​(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Result.cookie(String)
    play.mvc.Results.badRequest​(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.badRequest(File, Optional).
    play.mvc.Results.created​(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.created(File, Optional).
    play.mvc.Results.forbidden​(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.forbidden(File, Optional).
    play.mvc.Results.internalServerError​(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.internalServerError(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.networkAuthenticationRequired(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.notAcceptable(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.notFound(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.ok(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.paymentRequired(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.preconditionRequired(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.requestHeaderFieldsTooLarge(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.status(int, File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to StatusHeader.sendFile(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to StatusHeader.sendPath(Path, Optional).
    play.mvc.StatusHeader.sendResource​(String, boolean, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use StatusHeader.sendResource(String,boolean,Optional).
    play.server.ApplicationProvider.handleWebCommand​(Http.RequestHeader)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. WebCommands are now handled by the DefaultHttpRequestHandler.
    play.test.Helpers.contextComponents()
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Inject MessagesApi, Langs, FileMimeTypes or HttpConfiguration instead
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    play.core.j.MappedJavaHandlerComponents​(ActionCreator, HttpConfiguration, ExecutionContext, JavaContextComponents)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use constructor without JavaContextComponents
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.JPAApiProvider​(JPAConfig, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi, Config)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use JPAApiProvider(JPAConfig, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi) instead.
    play.DefaultApplication​(Application, Config, Injector)
    Use DefaultApplication(play.api.Application, Config, Injector, Environment) instead.
    play.libs.concurrent.HttpExecutionContext​(Executor)
    Deprecated as of 2.9.0. Use to ClassLoaderExecutionContext instead.
    play.mvc.BodyParser.DelegatingMultipartFormDataBodyParser​(Materializer, long, HttpErrorHandler)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use DelegatingMultipartFormDataBodyParser(Materializer, long, long, HttpErrorHandler) instead.
    play.routing.RoutingDsl​(BodyParser.Default, JavaContextComponents)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use constructor without JavaContextComponents
